task.title: How to Sign Your Name in a Word Document
task.shortdesc: Learn how to add your signature in a Microsoft Word document.

step.cmd: First, click on the Insert tab above the toolbar. Next, in the Lines section of the Shapes dropdown menu, click on Scribble.
After you click on Scribble, your cursor turns into a drawing tool. Finally, drag your mouse to sign your name.

taskbody.result: You have signed your name in your Word document.
